item.title: Comment on Clancy and Nancago by Shane
item.dc:creator: Shane
item.description: My bad, thought there was a new post and got excited! It was the what about Simone Weil paper I’d already read. Not sure I can get notified of posts or how to but will check back on occasion. Not even quite sure how I stumbled here in the first place but happy to have done so. Hopefully you still have some more insight forthcoming.
item.content:encoded: My bad, thought there was a new post and got excited! It was the what about Simone Weil paper I’d already read. Not sure I can get notified of posts or how to but will check back on occasion. Not even quite sure how I stumbled here in the first place but happy to have done so. Hopefully you still have some more insight forthcoming.

item.description: That’s great. Glad I remembered to revisit. About to go read it now.

item.title: Comment on Clancy and Nancago by lievenlb

item.description: @Shane : I'm working on some posts about Simone Weil's role. First one will surface soon.

item.title: Comment on Clancy and Nancago by Shane
item.dc:creator: Shane
item.description: Very much appreciate these writings. I definitely think there is more to Simone Weil’s connection to TOP. I think some of her writings would show up prevalently in their songs.
item.content:encoded: Very much appreciate these writings. I definitely think there is more to Simone Weil’s connection to TOP. I think some of her writings would show up prevalently in their songs.

item.title: Comment on Clancy and Nancago by Party Poison
item.dc:creator: Party Poison
item.description: Your TØP theories are incredible and very helpful right now, I can’t wait to hear what else you come up with! I linked your blog to a group of clique conspiracy theorists so I apologize if they bombard you with questions once they realize the impressive resources you offer.
item.content:encoded: Your TØP theories are incredible and very helpful right now, I can’t wait to hear what else you come up with! I linked your blog to a group of clique conspiracy theorists so I apologize if they bombard you with questions once they realize the impressive resources you offer.

item.title: Comment on What about Simone Weil? by lievenlb

item.title: Comment on What about Simone Weil? by sofia
item.dc:creator: sofia
item.description: Hey! I`m a clique from Ukraine and I am very interested in this blog! I have a fan account on Twitter where we translate a lot of information for the Ukrainian clique and I was wondering if we could translate articles about the Bourbaki group? we will leave the links to the articles thank you!
item.content:encoded:
Hey! I`m a clique from Ukraine and I am very interested in this blog! I have a fan account on Twitter where we translate a lot of information for the Ukrainian clique and I was wondering if we could translate articles about the Bourbaki group? we will leave the links to the articles
thank you!

item.title: Comment on big Witt vectors for everyone (1/2) by Sa Onne
item.dc:creator: Sa Onne
item.description:
Greetings! I just came across your blog --- thanks for all the interesting posts!
(1) I have not been able to find part two of this post on Witt vectors. Is it been posted under a different name?
(2) I have not been able see any comments, on this post or others. I have tried both firefox and the chrome browser.
THANKS!
item.content:encoded:
Greetings! I just came across your blog — thanks for all the interesting posts!

(1) I have not been able to find part two of this post on Witt vectors. Is it been posted under a different name?

(2) I have not been able see any comments, on this post or others. I have tried both firefox and the chrome browser.

THANKS!

item.title: Comment on A suit with shorts by Stephen Hu
item.dc:creator: Stephen Hu
item.description:
Hello,
I'm not sure if you have these left, but I would love Ireland and Rosen if you still have it. Do you have a copy of Neukirch's Algebraic Number Theory? I can't see the titles very well. If so, I would also love that. If you can see my email here I can give you the address.
item.content:encoded:
Hello,

I’m not sure if you have these left, but I would love Ireland and Rosen if you still have it. Do you have a copy of Neukirch’s Algebraic Number Theory? I can’t see the titles very well. If so, I would also love that. If you can see my email here I can give you the address.

item.title: Comment on Closure by David Roberts
item.dc:creator: David Roberts
item.description: Can you get it all into the Internet Archive, at least? It was disappointing when your G+ posts vanished, as there were some really valuable ones that are still linked from here.
item.content:encoded: Can you get it all into the Internet Archive, at least? It was disappointing when your G+ posts vanished, as there were some really valuable ones that are still linked from here.
